channel.title: Looking for Devs (new project)
channel.description:
I am looking for some developers for a new project. Server mode is not yet fixed, I'm waiting your answers so we can discuss about it.
What kind of Project? I have an idea in mind to create a simple 317 PK server. There will also be a few Quest's to make it a little more interesting. A basic project...
Informations: The serverhost, webhost and domain name will be paid by me. As long as Devs are active.
So yeah, i am looking for some devs... So you can PM me if you're intersted, with your experiences.
Thank you, (sorry for the lack of information, posted from my phone when i get home will Give more)

item.title: Looking for Devs (new project)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

neroxx:

Isn’t this 2[sup]nd[/sup] time you ask for a team? add pictures -.-

He followed what I said.

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:428435”]Wrong section. Also, use a layout, this looks like a big clop of information, and thats lame. Use this section:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,149.0.html[/quote]

Read full topic
